Story :

A horror-comedy set in a calm village, when a witch doctor breaks the forbidden rule, she turns into a blood thristy monster and begins hunting for the flesh. The villagers are scared of being hunted, they enlist many talents to defeat the witch doctor, but none of them succeed. Meanwhile, there&#039;re teenagers visit the village, but they&#039;re forced to encounter what they didn&#039;t expect to meet.
